name: Comrade
description:
This is a short game made for the Brackeys 2019 Game Jam with the theme : The game is a liar and made in one week.

The player is a secret police interrogator who interacts with suspects through dialogue and decides who is innocent or not.

Sadly, due to some technical issues I was not able to submit this game to the Jam but I still wanted to upload it for feedback. Please let me know what you think about this game in the comments.
